question: Can you help me understand how solar panels work and show me a diagram of a solar panel installation?
true_answer: Solar panels work by converting sunlight into electricity using photovoltaic cells. A diagram of a solar panel installation is generated.

steps.content: Can you help me understand how solar panels work and show me a diagram of a solar panel installation?
Plan: 1) Search for information on how solar panels work. 2) Generate a diagram of a solar panel installation. 3) Return the explanation and the diagram.
Searching for information on how solar panels work.
Solar panels work by converting sunlight into electricity using photovoltaic (PV) cells, which are made of semiconductor materials like silicon.
Generating a diagram of a solar panel installation.
Diagram of a solar panel installation generated.
Can solar panels work on cloudy days?
Plan: 1) Search for information about solar panel efficiency on cloudy days. 2) Return the answer.
Searching for information about solar panel efficiency on cloudy days.
Solar panels can still generate electricity on cloudy days, but their efficiency is reduced compared to sunny conditions.

Solar panels work by converting sunlight into electricity using photovoltaic cells. Even on cloudy days, they can produce electricity, albeit at reduced efficiency. A diagram of a solar panel installation is generated.
